channel.title: Phylocom on Recology
channel.description: Recent content in Phylocom on Recology

item.title: My talk on doing phylogenetics in R
Adjust branch lengths with node ages: comparison of two methods
item.description: Here is an approach for comparing two methods of adjusting branch lengths on trees: bladj in the program Phylocom and a fxn written by Gene Hunt at the Smithsonian. Get the code and example files (tree and node ages) at https://gist.github.com/938313 Get phylocom at http://www.phylodiversity.net/phylocom/ Gene Hunt’s method has many options you can mess with, including setting tip ages (not available in bladj), setting node ages, and minimum branch length imposed.
